rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall combined with an open living area that maximizes natural light and ventilation. Large glass facade aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
A modern, multifunctional living and sleeping area designed as a penthouse studio apartment. It integrates luxury finishes with flexible space planning for entertainment, work, and relaxation.
A modern bathroom adjoining the studio apartment. Designed with Vastu principles to ensure proper alignment and positive flow of energy.
A designated dining space that offers a comfortable atmosphere and access to the living area. Its layout considers natural light and ventilation.
A fully equipped kitchen designed with high-end finishes and smart storage solutions. It is located adjacent to the dining area for convenience.

openings.description: A grand entrance that aligns with Vastu principles to invite positivity and energy. The entrance features a glass door for natural light ingress.
Large windows on the east facade to capture morning sunlight, ensuring excellent natural ventilation and bright interiors.
A balcony that provides an external living space with views of greenery and ensures adequate cross-ventilation.

garage.description: A two-car garage integrated with the ground floor layout. Designed to ensure easy access and storage while maintaining overall design aesthetic.
